title: Can Job
description: She didn’t even WANT this job. She’d rather spend her time getting to know that incredibly cute guy on the other side of the conference table.But now Taylor’s responsible for launching a new product, and EVERYTHING depends on her pulling it off.The company’s future.The masterfully-plotted career of her boss’s boss. The teetering marriage of one Very Important local politician.Oh, plus the economy of the entire city of Borschtester, NY.Then Taylor make a horrible discovery.The product they’re launching?It doesn’t actually exist . . .CAN JOB.Like your job. Only funny.
author: Kirsten Mortensen
